title: How to keep a girl laughing and smiling - Quora
tags: Relationships and Dating of Young People

response.answer_text: As per as I know or what I do with my gf is that I praise her a lot finding out all the positive facts. I never false praise. I do all that stuffs that she does and express to her in a different matter... This makes her happy and finally I se her smiling trust me its the best thing I have ever seen... Try this you can surely make her laugh
